comment.body:
JButton object for Metal scrollbar arrows.

Warning: Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with future Swing releases. The current serialization support is appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running the same version of Swing. As of 1.4, support for long term storage of all JavaBeansTM has been added to the java.beans package. Please see {@link java.beans.XMLEncoder}. @version 1.15 08/28/98 @author Tom Santos @author Steve Wilson
